solution_line_template: For table arrangements, she needs {num_table_decorations}*{roses_per_table_decoration}=<<{num_table_decorations}*{roses_per_table_decoration}={roses_for_table_decorations}>>{roses_for_table_decorations} white roses.
For bouquets, she needs {num_bouquets}*{roses_per_bouquet}=<<{num_bouquets}*{roses_per_bouquet}={roses_for_bouquets}>>{roses_for_bouquets} white roses.
Thus, in total, she needs {roses_for_table_decorations}+{roses_for_bouquets}=<<{roses_for_table_decorations}+{roses_for_bouquets}={total_white_roses}>>{total_white_roses} white roses.
